definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: B： By sea， please. Because of the high cost of railway transportation， we prefer sea transportation.
sentences.chinese: 請海運發貨，鐵路運輸費用太高，我們願意走海運。

sentences.english: B： By sea， please. Because of the high cost of railway transportation， we prefer sea transportation.
sentences.chinese: 請海運發貨，鐵路運輸費用太高，我們願意走海運。

sentences.english: We are a company related to Maritime Transportation.
sentences.chinese: 我們是一個有關海運公司。

sentences.english: How do you like to send it, by air or by surface?
sentences.chinese: 您想要哪種寄法，航空還是海運？

sentences.english: Shipping I will let you know when we get exact amount.
sentences.chinese: 海運費的話，等我們知道具體金額再告訴你。

sentences.english: They attributed the damage to the effect of dampness during the long sea voyage .
sentences.chinese: 他們把損失歸咎於長途海運中受潮了。

sentences.english: Large containers for shipping bulk powder coatings.
sentences.chinese: 粉末塗料用於海運的箱子。

sentences.english: Marine insurance policy includes "both to blame" collision clauses and fully covers the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 海運保險單包括負責船舶互撞條款和全部貨載。

sentences.english: Have a good relation with ship-owners and most advantage price of shipping.
sentences.chinese: 與各船東良好的合作關係及極具優勢海運價格。

sentences.english: The shipping company, for additional freight, undertakes to make all arrangements to get the goods to their destination.
sentences.chinese: 海運公司將承擔額外的運費負責將貨物運達目的地。

sentences.english: Offer Tianjin Port international ocean shipping service, with best price, guarantee of shipping space.
sentences.chinese: 天津港起運國際海運最優價格，艙位保證。

sentences.english: This term can only be used for sea or inland waterway transportation.
sentences.chinese: 本術語僅用於海運或內河運輸。

sentences.english: We are specialized in fast delivery into the public warehouses inside Ocean and Air Terminals.
sentences.chinese: 特別提供最快捷的海運及空運公倉交貨服務。

sentences.english: Thus Shenzhen became a central hub for railroads, highways, marine transportations and air transportations.
sentences.chinese: 這樣深圳成爲了鐵路，公路，海運和航空的樞紐。

sentences.english: How should be we answered again, does with promoting international the abidance of marine course of study develop?
sentences.chinese: 我們又該如何應對，以促進國際海運業的持續發展？

definition: abbr. for 中遠集團|中远集团[Zhong1 yuan3 Ji2 tuan2], COSCO (China Ocean Shipping Company)
